text:
Harry Jacob van den Bergh (1 April 1942 – 20 March 2020) was a Dutch politician of Jewish descent. He was a member of the Labour Party (PvdA). In 1977–1987 van den Bergh was a member of the lower house. Later he became a councilor in Amstelveen.
He was born in Amsterdam and died in Amstelveen at the age of 77.
